review: im zigging it  really good game btw

games okay took me two runs to beat it the game has no correlation between unlocking items you just sometimes unlock items from a run and sometimes dont they arent linked to achievements and i see no way of telling how i just unlocked an item i have spawned in and just killed myself and that unlocked an item so i have no idea every fun just feels the same kind of and some of the weapons are so bad also attempting to 100 is giving me an aneurysm i hope the second game is better
this is just bullet spam dodge at quake 3 arena speed nothing impressive certainly not worth the base price the default weapon wand they start you with is also a piece of crap

simple roguelike a little stiff feeling but overall enjoyable to play there seems to be a decent amount of stuff to unlock in the game but for me i felt like i saw all i really wanted to see after 2 complete runs on sale id say give it a try for retail id say buy a better roguelike of which there are many

pretty bad motion sickness even after mucking with the settings levels seemed way too big enemies just spawn in felt like it didnt have a lot of style mushrooms should have been growing out of the ground skeletons should have been rising from the grave etc etc  if youre really into the gameplay then im sure its fun especially once you level up some and get synergies going or whatever i just couldnt play more than a half hour

difficult challenging fast paced annoying fun  just a few ways to describe this game  worth a play for sure  it is kinda like that mobile game archero wherein if you dont get the right perks youre totally screwed but when the cards align it becomes almost a walk in the park  loads of characters to unlock ive only beaten it once in 10 playthroughs on normal difficulty
not especially fun
play this before the sequel otherwise you wont be able to enjoy it
shut your brain off while wand go brrrrrrrrrrrr it might look a little dated and your build might feel a little basic but the game is fun and the action is fast paced
fantasticcccc
magic make brain go brr
i love the carrots
its a pretty repetitive fps with no level design
it is utterly depressing how a game that i wouldve considered just decent in 2014 is now somehow above average in this genre
childhood peak
excellent game love the movement very quake 3 and fun in that regard quite a spike in difficulties which is very enjoyable  great game
love the hexen 2 vibes
i love it roguelite hexen done in the best way possible really feels like this game doesnt get the love it deserves its quite a gem
aint no way around it aint around it aint no way around it

it was good for those times nowadays its way too slow since newer games make movement really fast regarding fps roguelike games  its not long and its not hard either something to turn your brain off and look at colors on the screen
a fun little game with some humor some good reflexes and some luck with the perks and you can win every round  my complete run took me about 1 hour without dying man i got lucky that round
this game is a blast
magic sucks  something with the camera makes me sick dodge this spellcaster

maybe this is just a genre thing  unfair but this game is really not very fun its much more of an arcade game than i was expecting pretty much all you do is walk into arenas that look identical to one another use some pretty underwhelming combat to fight through them all then you eventually die at some point and have to start over from scratch   it looks much more interesting than it actually is

wow this game is 11 years old in 2025 i mean it looks fine nothing extra the whole game is nothing extra in the last 10 years the arenafpsrouglite genre has evolved much this feels basic but i cannot thumb down it because it is a decent old game
i already finished the game and i only saw 2 different wands two different staffs and two alchemy weapons still dont know what the blue mana is for get it on sale if youre really interested
fun little game

good game with a vast amount of items and characters the balancing is near perfect i 100 the game with 1st timing all the hard achievements  old pupils  reunion unstoppable intensive course and hands tied  because im like that
an afternoons fun with only one runs worth of content to enjoy the merit of which depends on how heavy of a discount you bought it on
game good
heat
had a fun run ultimately not my type of game but if you enjoy fps and roguelike youre in for a treat
its alright interesting concept reminds me a lot of immortal redneck but the gunplay just doesnt feel very satisfying the shots dont quite go where you expect them to especially at longer distances
good stuff plays well has fun weapons too bad it seems most of the weapons are unlocked after finishinggrinding and i finished the game on my second run i still recommend it regardless
this game is fine fun to play lots of character weapons perks and amulet to try very enjoyable if you are looking some mindless shooting and exploring

its hades but a lot older and its all magic and ranged cant remember if it had a story as i played this years back i remembered it due to playing hades and thought id give it some love with a review movements fast and a little floaty you zoom around avoiding stuff so might cause some people who are sensitive to motion in games some issues if you grab it in a sale or bundle give it a spin 1279 seems a little steep for a old game but its a gem
i dont even know how this game got into my library i assume as part of a bundle or something but for a decade old game its surprisingly good
the game keeps resetting settings like graphics and language each time i turn it on
youre a wizard harry
eat your carrots they give you 2020 vision

the game is fascinating featuring a variety of monsters and bosses hidden rooms etc it provides a lot of fun and excellent replayability i really enjoy unlocking items and upgrades as i navigate the randomly generated mazes i plan to get the sequel once ive finished this one if that ever happensive already played for over 11 hours and still love it
doorslam

clearly made on a budget but provides entertaining fastpaced combat which keeps you replaying   the lore scrolls  secret rooms are the weakest aspects of the game they should have been reworked or removed entirely
its fine too dull and repetitive to really keep you coming back for more though

this game is a bag of potato chips i struggle to describe them as good but asking if theyre good or not is sort of missing the point of the function they serve ive also been glad to have it when i want a little meaningless junk food and i like it well enough for that purpose   this game is immortal redneck but with wands instead of guns and thats fine

it is all based on luck skill is much less important than luck in this game still fun when you dont get the same shit weapon on all floors or no health potions unless you are a character that cant use potions
sei l eu gosto

fairly archaic roguelike bullet hell theres better games out there but im a sucker for generic fantasy nonsense as long as its fun and interesting dont be fooled by the first two floors it does get pretty hectic and difficulty ramps up significantly by the third floor pretty good to waste a few minutes

ziggurat is probably the only game ive 100 on steam its really friggin good if you enjoy roguelikes even better if you like fps and even better if you like fantasymagic theme  1010 good thing there is ziggurat 2 hopefully milkstone will make a third  or branch out and do another magicbased rougelike fps
its hard and can be frustrating but its a fun and good game
i used to like carrots

really good fps roguelike the four weapon types are super fun to change around and mix the only problems i have are a weird lighting bug which afaik is only for my specific pc setup slight replayability issues and balancing the perks a decent chunk of the perks are straight up useless would still recommend especially if on sale
while i havent played this game in a long time i had a lot of fun with it in my childhood and i can recommend it
rich mans devil daggers
little carrot bastard goes hard feel free to screenshot
youre as beautiful as the day i lost you
eye of twilight go burrrr

this is way different than i expected and im glad  game is super fun and i can see myself putting quite a bit of time into it going further into the dungeons and learning how to master the gameplay is going to be rewarding  i should find more games like this that do a little bit of everything dungeoncrawling fps roguelite
great game and its sequel checks out   if you like this vibe roboquest is right up your alley
absolutely love this game i would boot it up whenever i had some time to kill going back to it after a few years and its as good as i remember
the controls are a little floaty but once you get used to them this is a very fun game

the game is a fun roguelite fps that blends in various modifiers and spelltypes in a procedural generated dungeon movement is floaty but not to a degree where it hinders your ability to dodge enemy projectiles there enough variety with weapons enemies and class types to keep the player invested for several hours especially if you want to unlock everything the game has to offer  easy to learn fun to experiment
i just popped in to say i love this game
great movement very fun game
pretty short and simple arcade fps roguelike nice to play after some big longer games
on of my favorites 3
great rougelike only issue is it is a fps so no controller can be used

this one is quite good  a fps roguelike mage dungeon crawler sort of reminds me of the old games like hectic it got its quakelike fast paced shooter mechanics in a randomly generated fantasylike dungeon as you keep trying out to reach the top of the ziggurat new items and characters are unlocked  i wont spoil the rest of the fun  if you like roguelike games and magic give it a spin   solid 810
good

fun and challenging dungeon wizardness delve it

i really wish i could give it a meh because the game is certainly not bad but it has many flaws repetitive enemies  the bosses are just bigger versions of the already few enemies some enemies shots will follow you and do splash damage basically impossible to dodge the soundtrack is very forgettable the rooms layouts are too simple and i had a lot of repeated rooms on my playthrough overall id give this game a 6 out of 10 i finished 1 run and for me that was enough buy it on sale

what a fun game you choose from many wizards with different atributes and enter into ziggurat you need to finish five floors with boss at the end of each one you clear room by room unlock new talents and picking up new or better weapons if you played the binding of isaac you will know the premise   gameplay 55 story 25 design 45 graphics 35 soundtrack 25 h1 rating 810 h1
its a roguelike first person shooter game with random rooms on each new run its okay but gets boring quickly 510

fps fantasy roguelite is a good time
